category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Confirmation_shown_on_reservation_dialogs
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether a Don't show confirmation dialog again check box is displayed in the Check-Out, Cancel Check-Out, and Check-In dialog boxes in the rich client and thin client. Valid Values: true - The Don't show confirmation dialog again check box is displayed. false - The Don't show confirmation dialog again check box is not displayed.
